tool_description: Calculates appropriate portion sizes and total food quantities needed based on guest demographics, event duration, and meal types.

age_distribution.description: Age group percentages (child, teen, adult, senior) as strings like '20% child'

meal_service_style.description: Service style (buffet, plated, family-style, cocktail, stations)

menu_courses.description: List of courses to be served (appetizer, salad, main, dessert, etc.)

include_buffer.description: Whether to include extra portions as buffer

dietary_restriction_percentage.description: Percentage of guests with special dietary needs

error_messages: Invalid guest count: Provide a positive integer between 1 and 5000.
Age distribution format error: Use format like '30% adult', '20% child' with percentages adding up to 100%.
Invalid event duration: Event duration must be between 1 and 24 hours.
Unsupported service style: Use buffet, plated, family-style, cocktail, or stations.
Invalid appetite level: Choose from light, moderate, or hearty.
Dietary restriction percentage out of range: Value must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide guest_count, age_distribution percentages, event_duration_hours, meal_service_style, and menu_courses. Optionally set appetite_level, include_buffer, and dietary_restriction_percentage. Returns detailed quantity calculations.

total_portions_needed.description: Total number of portions to prepare across all courses

course_portions.description: Portion counts for each course (e.g., 'appetizer: 120 portions')

weight_estimates.description: Weight estimates for proteins and main ingredients

buffer_included.description: Additional portions included as safety buffer
